Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and prepare for the design team meeting.
Present the refined concepts to the design team for critique.
Take notes during the critique and gather feedback.
Review feedback and start planning improvements based on the critique.
Email @ldes-1, @uiux-1, and @sdes-1 to discuss feedback and follow-up actions.
Wrap up the work for the week and log out.
